content:
Kako lahko na svojo ps4 konzolo priklopim zvočnike?
Na konzolo bi priklopil tipkovnico, miško in monitor. Monitor pa nima zvočnikov. 
Kako to naredim? Slušalke lahko dam v kontroler, kam pa zvočnike lahko priklopim?
author: Flikca

content:
Odvisno kakšne zvočnike imaš. 

Verjetno bo najlažje z tem:


	

	
		
			
				
					
						
					
				
			
			
				
					
						RCA Female to 3.5mm (Stereo) Female Cable
					
				

				Connects headphone / speaker to your favour game consoles (Xbox, Playstaton 2 or Xbox 360) or any device with RCA out.

				
					
						
					
					videogame.brando.com
author: Vadim

content:
5 Ways to Connect Speakers to a PS4
					
				

				Connect speakers to a PS4 using an optical cable, audio extractor, 3.5 mm cable, or wirelessly Do you want to connect your PS4 to a speaker so you can get better sound while you game? You can do this either by connecting the console itself...

author: scorpion
